item.title: DroidKaigi 2016
item.description: From 2/18/2016 to 2/19/2016, there was one Android conference which is called DroidKaigi in Tokyo. Say, why am I writing such a thing? Because I’m one of the member of DroidKaigi and I definitely want to tell you about its awesomeness. And I know some guys will post a Japanese article soon, so I’m going to try to explain it in English:) Talks and Speakers I
